snippet: MONTAK--Irving. The Yeshiva University family mourns the recent passing of Irving Montak. Mr. Montak provided generous support to YU's Stern College for Women and dedicated the Montak Technology Center in memory of his beloved parents and brothers, William and Fannie Montak, and Sam and Israel Montak. May his family be comforted among those who mourn for Zion and Jerusalem. Richard M. Joel, President, Yeshiva University Norman Lamm, President Emeritus 1/3
lead_paragraph: MONTAK--Irving. The Yeshiva University family mourns the recent passing of Irving Montak. Mr. Montak provided generous support to YU's Stern College for Women and dedicated the Montak Technology Center in memory of his beloved parents and brothers, William and Fannie Montak, and Sam and Israel Montak. May his family be comforted among those who mourn for Zion and Jerusalem. Richard M. Joel, President, Yeshiva University Norman Lamm, President Emeritus 1/3
